author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
With golden hue it riseth bright,
As U.S. data waits in sight,
For interest rates the key is found,
In bullion's future, God is bound.

Ere crude gains rise amidst the fray,
O'er Europe's soil, a price held sway,
To OPEC's words we seek this week,
For dear God's blessings, e'en the meek.

To German lands, our tale then goes,
For there belies industrial woes,
As interest curbs consuming hearts,
The car production wanes, departs.

feedItems.title: Gold Edges Up With US CPI Awaited
feedItems.description: Gold prices ticked higher ahead of U.S. inflation data later this week that will shape the Fed’s views on interest rates, and will likely be a key driver for bullion prices.

feedItems.title: Crude Gains After Volatile Week
feedItems.description: Oil futures rose more than 1% in Europe following a volatile stretch of trading that has seen prices slump, with traders looking for fresh clues on crude demand this week from OPEC and the EIA.

feedItems.title: Drop in German Industrial Production Worse Than Expected
feedItems.description: German industrial output fell 3.4% in March, weighed by a decline in automotive production, suggesting weak demand as high interest rates curbed consumer spending.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In bonds, the Eurozone yields small change we see,
As German output falls in melancholy march,
With echoes of a goat's weak bleating, hard to hear,
So nature speaks, but few among us catch the words.

In lands of rising sun, the Nikkei wilts like blooms,
Pulled down by banks and energy ere falls the night,
As rabbits burrow down, with central tightening reins,
Disperse the shadow that on nature casts its pall.

The dollar stumbles, like a dog with unsure paws,
As U.S. banks and debt their heavy burdens bear,
While snails do slither slow, their soft paths to trace,
And dreams of lower rates in Fed's dark dance unwind.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Bond Yields Show Muted Reaction to Weak German Industrial Output
feedItems.description: Eurozone government bond yields were little changed after data showed German industrial output declined more than expected in March, with ING commenting that “all German macro data in March plunged.”

feedItems.title: Nikkei Falls 0.7%, Dragged by Bank, Energy, Electronics Stocks
feedItems.description: Japanese stocks ended lower, dragged by falls in bank, energy and electronics stocks, amid continued concerns about policy tightening by central banks.

feedItems.title: Dollar Falls as US Banking, Debt Ceiling Concerns Override Strong Data
feedItems.description: The dollar continued to edge lower as concerns over U.S. banking-sector stress and debt ceiling negotiations keep alive expectations the Fed will cut interest rates soon, despite Friday’s above-forecast jobs data, Swissquote said.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In lands where AI's might doth grow,
As ChatGPT's vigor keen doth show,
Look now upon Afric's shore,
Where conference weighs the boon and lore.

But minds deceived we oft do find,
As nimble tasks doth cloud the mind,
Our brains in truth, by fate impugned,
Struggle to grasp this dance ill-tuned.

From Bakhmut's ground, dark Wagner rose,
Once set to leave, yet now repose,
For Russia's aid, a promise sure,
With ammunition free, endure.

feedItems.title: AI Researchers Worry the U.S. and China Will Leave Everyone Else Behind
feedItems.description: After ChatGPT sparked a frenzy among tech companies, a conference in Africa is focusing on AI’s promise and peril for poorer nations.

feedItems.title: The Lies We Tell Ourselves About Multitasking
feedItems.description: Our brains aren’t wired to juggle tasks.

feedItems.title: The leader of Russian paramilitary group Wagner said he has reversed his decision to fully withdraw from Bakhmut, Ukraine, after pledges from Russia to provide more ammunition and operational freedom.
feedItems.description: The leader of Russian paramilitary group Wagner said he has reversed his decision to fully withdraw from Bakhmut, Ukraine, after pledges from Russia to provide more ammunition and operational freedom.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Of cosmic guards and thrilling tales,
A hoard of golden sales prevails,
One hundred fourteen million graces,
Walt Disney's Marvel claim their places.

Upon the alleys 'round the church,
El Paso migrants come to perch,
In hope of change from throne so great,
The Biden reign to illuminate.

Of markets' gamble, fear's embrace,
Money managers cautious pace,
Whilst seeking refuge from the wild,
In labyrinths of stocks beguiled.

feedItems.title: The latest "Guardians of the Galaxy" movie tallied $114 million in domestic ticket sales this weekend, giving Walt Disney's Marvel Studios a strong but tepid start to the aging franchise's release.
feedItems.description: The latest “Guardians of the Galaxy” movie tallied $114 million in domestic ticket sales this weekend, giving Walt Disney’s Marvel Studios a strong but tepid start to the aging franchise’s release.

feedItems.title: Thousands of migrants have set up an encampment on sidewalks and alleys around a church in El Paso, Texas, ahead of a planned policy change by the Biden administration.
feedItems.description: Thousands of migrants have set up an encampment on sidewalks and alleys around a church in El Paso, Texas, ahead of a planned policy change by the Biden administration.

feedItems.title: Money managers are shying away from risk, turning to defensive stocks and Treasurys, but they appear equally worried about missing out on a potential stock-market rally.
feedItems.description: Money managers are shying away from risk, turning to defensive stocks and Treasurys, but they appear equally worried about missing out on a potential stock-market rally.
